meanings.sent1: The sloshiest drink spilled all over the table.
meanings.sent2: After the rain, the ground was at its sloshiest.
meanings.sent3: The sloshiest puddle made the dog jump around in excitement.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was the sloshiest sound in the room.
meanings.sent5: The sloshiest mud made it hard to walk through the field.

meanings.sent1: The sloshiest soup spilled from the bowl.
meanings.sent2: The sloshiest part of the boat was near the edge.
meanings.sent3: The sloshiest bucket of water splashed all over the floor.
meanings.sent4: His words were the sloshiest when he was drunk.
meanings.sent5: The sloshiest waves crashed against the shore.
